title: Champion Insights: We are the Spear of Vengeance

replies.body: The rotation already changed before this came out
Played Kalista all day to Jump Around - House Of Pain
This is really cool! I love hearing about how she came to be as she is. I'd love to hear more about other champions!

I think you guys really hit the mark with Kalista, as a player who never usually never plays adc, i picked her up and cant stop playing, nothing funner than jumping around impaling your foes with spectral spears
Seems a bit disconnected how this post came out well after Rek'Sai was released.
